title: How to Play Call of Duty 4 Online

steps.title: insert the Call of Duty 4 disk into your CD or DVD drive and launch the game.
steps.content: insert the Call of Duty 4 disk into your CD or DVD drive and launch the game.

steps.title: Select the "Multiplayer Menu."
steps.content: Select the "Multiplayer Menu." This will bring you to a menu where you can choose to join a game, start a new server, select the player profile you wish to use, return to the single player menu or quit the game.

steps.title: Choose one of the displayed options.
steps.content: Choose one of the displayed options. To play online, the fastest option is to select the "Join a Game" option from the menu.

steps.title: Select the game you wish to join from the menu listed.
steps.content: Select the game you wish to join from the menu listed. You are now able to play online

steps.title: Turn your PlayStation 3 or Xbox 360 on and insert the Call of Duty 4 disk.
steps.content: Turn your PlayStation 3 or Xbox 360 on and insert the Call of Duty 4 disk. The game will execute automatically.

steps.title: Select the "Multiplayer" option at the bottom of the main menu.
steps.content: Select the "Multiplayer" option at the bottom of the main menu.

steps.title: Select the "Play Online" option.
steps.content: Select the "Play Online" option. This will prompt a sign on screen for the PlayStation Network. The Xbox 360 is automatically connected to the network when the console is turned on. If you do not currently have a membership with the PlayStation Network or Xbox Live.

steps.title: Select either the "Find Game" option or "Private Match" option to begin playing online.
steps.content: Select either the "Find Game" option or "Private Match" option to begin playing online.

steps.title: Select your character and begin playing.
steps.content: Select your character and begin playing.
